ThingDef.label: alpha chicken egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized alpha chicken egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. These eggs are pure, pristine, perfect examples of chicken eggs. Inmaculate eggness.

ThingDef.label: alpha chicken egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized alpha chicken egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. These eggs are pure, pristine, perfect examples of chicken eggs. Inmaculate eggness. If all goes well, it should hatch into an alpha chicken.

ThingDef.label: alpha emu egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized alpha emu egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. This thing is huge.

ThingDef.label: alpha emu egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized alpha emu egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. This thing is huge. If all goes well, it should hatch into an alpha emu.
